data.subject: You Needed Me (Re-Mastered)
data.lyric:
I cried a tear
 You wiped it dry
 I was confused
 You cleared my mind
 I sold my soul
 You bought it

data.subject: The Palace Of Versailles (Re-Recorded) (드라마 `응답하라 1988`) (Live)
data.lyric:

 From the walls of the Bastille
 And through the streets of Paris
 Run

data.subject: Papa (Re-Recorded) (Live)
data.lyric:
